t: Brand | The Battle Bricks Wiki | Fandom
s: March 10, 2025 - Brand is a Red enemy introduced in the Classic+ update. It is an enemy you encounter in Red Herring, debuting in Recolor Red. Brand looks like a downgraded Firebrand, instead having black bandages / gloves on his arms and a repainted Linked Sword instead of an actual Firebrand. Face: https...
